name: TheForest | Procedurally Generated
description:
This project procedurally generates the forest once and you can also generate the forest again by talking to the flat board NPC named "Stranger"

Controls:

WASD to move 

Hold shift then WASD to sprint 

Press E to interact with NPC

Mouse Click to interact the dialogue options. 

Esc to quit game

Credits:

https://github.com/SebLague/Procedural-Landmass-Generation
